title: Analyze Prior Year C-Corp Return
description: A new corporate client wants their prior year Form 1120 reviewed for accuracy.

tasks.description: Obtain and review the prior year Form 1120 and the company's financial statements.
Reconcile the book income from the financial statements to the taxable income on the return using Schedule M-1 or M-3.
Identify any potential errors or missed deductions and advise the client on whether to amend the return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a significant missed deduction and recommends filing an amended return.
